img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/15/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2821%29.png)
The health bar for the Pale-Axe Stalwart will appear as soon as you approach the open area. There will be Revenants and Bull Soldiers fighting around you, but you can ignore these and focus solely on the Pale-Axe Stalwart for this miniboss fight.
img_below_text:
He uses a huge axe, so most of his attacks are slow swings. The main approach to this fight should be to dodge the slow attacks, then immediately follow up with a combo as he takes time to recover.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(23\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2823%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

The health bar for the Pale-Axe Stalwart will appear as soon as you approach the open area. There will be Revenants and Bull Soldiers fighting around you, but you can ignore these and focus solely on the Pale-Axe Stalwart for this miniboss fight."
            - Following Text: "He uses a huge axe, so most of his attacks are slow swings. The main approach to this fight should be to dodge the slow attacks, then immediately follow up with a combo as he takes time to recover.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the player character is engaged in a miniboss fight against the Pale-Axe Stalwart. The scene is set in a desolate, battle-scarred area with other enemies, such as Revenants and Bull Soldiers, present but not the primary focus. The Pale-Axe Stalwart is wielding a large axe, preparing to swing it, while the player character is poised to dodge and counterattack. The image serves to illustrate the intense combat and strategy required to defeat this miniboss.
